Chris Dollin wrote:

>On Monday 21 March 2005 10:46, sadia zai wrote:
>  
>
>>i want to test the types of two objects are same or not ,,
>>how can i do dis
>>    
>>
>
>(guessing)
>
>    assertEquals( O1.getClass(), O2.getClass() );
>
>  
>

you can also use...


assertTrue(o1.getClass().isInstance(o2.getClass());

See
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/Class.html#isInstance(java.lang.Object

or

assertTrue(o1.getClass().isAssignableFrom(o2.getClass());

http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/Class.html#isAssignableFrom(java.lang.Class)
